name: Tommy Button
description:
Tommy Button

made for Mini Jame Gam # 16

Meet Tommy - a curious and adventurous young boy who longs for excitement and fun.


Unfortunately, his overbearing mother has imposed strict rules and limitations on him, leaving him feeling trapped and unhappy. In an attempt to break free from the monotony of his life, Tommy takes matters into his own hands and decides to embark on an epic adventure.

With your help, he will explore mysterious caves, defy his mother's rules, and discover the thrill of breaking free from conformity. Join Tommy on this daring journey and experience the rush of living life on the edge!

Source code availible on GitHub
